title: I want to get my old account back
body: So I made this account because I couldn't log in to my main account spy123z 3 years ago. I decided I want that account back please message me with further details thank you

replies.body:
I'm sure your old account misses you as much as you miss it. We can assist you with recovering this account if you submit a support ticket using [**this form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and provide *as much info* as you can recall about the account.

Let me know if you have any questions.
